name: XWUI Button Group Component
description: Group of buttons displayed together with consistent styling. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations, selection states, and custom variants. Uses XWUIButton components internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

variant.description: Visual variant of the button group

size.description: Size of the buttons in the group

orientation.description: Layout orientation of the button group

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the button group

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

buttons.description: Array of button items to display in the group

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the button
